attributes.action: A petition to make Emile Heskey England manager with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: There is strong evidence that Aston villa's decline was attributed to his departure and that the national team has never been the same.
attributes.background: Emile William Ivanhoe Heskey  is an English professional footballer who last played as a striker for Championship club Bolton Wanderers. Before joining the club, he made more than 500 appearances in the Football League and Premier League over an 18-year career, and represented England.
